about.title: About us
about.subtitle: IPEC Energy Kazakhstan
about.description1: An independent research and business analytics company providing clients with reliable data and strategic insights for more effective decision making, especially in the oil & gas and mining industries.
about.description2: IPEC Energy is a 'house of knowledge' bringing together experts with international experience at Halliburton, Schlumberger, investment banks, and Big Three and Big Four consulting companies. We work at the intersection of engineering, economics-finance, law and IT, providing an integrated approach to solving complex problems.
